import avatar from "../assets/avatar.png"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faLinkedinIn, faGithub } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; import ButtonWithLink from "./ButtonWithLink"; function Greetings() { return (
Hello, World!
I'm Danial Ross.
Web Developer.
{/* */}
); } export default Greetings;
